ygData.msgSnippet: Well, we finally got the source from Tom (thanks, Tom), and have made a reference release. OpenGlad 0.1 is a reference release containing 100% unmodified

Well, we finally got the source from Tom (thanks, Tom), and have made a
reference release. OpenGlad 0.1 is a reference release containing 100%
unmodified Forgotten Sages' Gladiator code. It probably doesn't compile
under any modern compiler, but if you're brave, give the latest version of
Watcom C++ a try(I think its at http://openwatcom.com now, but I'm not
sure if they're providing full downloads yet). However, the release
includes binaries, so you don't have to compile it to be able to play it.

Once again, this should be identical to the latest version of Gladiator.
You can download it at http://sourceforge.net/projects/snowstorm if you
want to check it out. People using Winzip and the like will want to
download the .zip file. The .tar.gz file is there mostly for the sake of
Snowstorm programmers, most of whom preffer that format.

Anyways, have fun. Snowstorm's next step is to get it compiling, and we'll
see where we go from there. Probably a bug-fix release or something. I'll
write up a roadmap and post it on the project page sometime in the near
future.


- Yan
